code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./login.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState("");const[room,setRoom]=useState("");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container w-25 mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"login-h1",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{method:"post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-group",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),type:"text",placeholder:"Username",required:true,className:"form-control form-input"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-group",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:e=>setRoom(e.target.value),type:"text",placeholder:"Room",required:true,className:"form-control form-input"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{onClick:e=>!name||!room?e.preventDefault():null,to:"/chat?name=".concat(name,"&room=").concat(room),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",className:"form-submit",value:"Log In"})})]})]});};export default Login;
